trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowStateChanged"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> property to determine which row changed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>propriedade para determinar que linha alterada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> property to determine which row state changed.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>alterar a propriedade para determinar o estado da linha.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre como lidar com eventos, consulte [NIB: consumir eventos](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the parameter values to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor utiliza os valores de parâmetros para inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.StateChanged%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowStateChangedEventArgs.Row%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> que tem um Estado de foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> que indica o estado que foram alteradas na linha de valores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> que tem um Estado de foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"></xref> that has a changed state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow"> </xref> que tem um Estado de foi alterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estado que foram alteradas na linha.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values indicating the state that has changed on the row.
trans-unit.target: Um do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> que indica o estado que foram alteradas na linha de valores.
